actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
required_date, fleet_id,fleet_tracking_id,invoice_number, shop_id
FROM trip_level_invoice where 
fleet_tracking_id in ('{{
											(moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') >='2022-11-01')?(search_fleetIdCopy.text==null ||search_fleetIdCopy.text==''?(get_parcel_details_panel.data.map((a)=>a.tracking_id).join("','")): (Api1Copy.data.map((a)=>a.tracking_id).join("','"))):
											(search_fleetIdCopy.text==null ||search_fleetIdCopy.text=='')? (get_parcel_details.data.map((a)=>a.tracking_id).join("','")): (Api1.data.map((a)=>a.tracking_id).join("','"))}}') 
and
status not in ('Invalid')
and date(required_date) between '{{moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD')}}' and '{{moment(DatePicker1Copy.selectedDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD')}}'
and shop_id = {{parseInt(search_shop_id.selectedOptionValue)}}
